original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: US officials, including Vice President J.D. Vance, Secretary of State Marco Rubio, and presidential envoy Steve Witkoff, are leading efforts to facilitate a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukraine's Vladimir Zelensky, as part of the peace process for the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Meanwhile, a Ukrainian man has been arrested in Italy in connection with the 2022 Nord Stream pipeline sabotage.</s>
